main_business: Electronics recycling and IT asset disposition
description: An R2V3 certified company that repurposes used or retired electronics and materials by refurbishing them and extracting surplus value. They focus on data security, asset recovery, and environmentally responsible recycling.
products_services: Custom tailored IT asset disposition programs
Reverse logistics and supply chain management
Resale of refurbished Fitbit devices (Versa 4, Charge 2, Versa, Versa Lite, Charge 5, Sense, Alta HR, Charge 4, Versa 3, Versa 2, Luxe, Sense 2, Inspire2, Inspire3, Charge 6)
summary:
C & C Lifestyle Inc is an R2V3 certified electronics recycling and IT asset disposition company. Their core business involves repurposing used or retired electronics from manufacturers, companies, and schools, including computers, mobile phones, and office equipment. They emphasize data security through certified sanitization processes and aim to extract maximum value from assets through refurbishment and resale, while ensuring environmentally responsible recycling for non-working components.

The company offers a range of services including custom asset recovery programs, reverse logistics, data sanitization, and recycling. They have a diverse sales network and downstream supply chain with R2V3 certified partners across different states. Their team has been in the wireless business since the release of the iPhone 3, bringing decades of experience in device renewal and data removal. The company focuses on minimizing environmental impact by diverting devices from landfills and promoting sustainable practices.
